news_header: British rapper Yung Filly charged with rape allegations in Australia.
news_text: Yung Filly, whose real name is Andres Felipe Valencia Barrientos, has been charged with multiple sexual offenses in Australia, including four counts of sexual penetration without consent. He was arrested in Brisbane and extradited to Perth for a court hearing after an alleged incident involving a woman in her 20s at a hotel on September 28. Barrientos, 29, is known for his work with the YouTube collective Beta Squad and has appeared on various UK television shows. His bail application has been approved, and his representatives have been contacted for comments.
